title: Smartgoat
author: Smartgoat
content: I think everyone should be very careful now. the country has gone out of control, from head to bottom.    A whole Divisional police officer, butchered like a Rabbit in one LGA in a state in Nigeria and they jubilantly beheaded him, cut off his hand, legs and dismembered his body including his penix . since this news broke, I never get myself and I feel terribly pained.the young lads that killed him were boasting and celebrating, what a shame to this country. if this can of a thing will happen to D.P.O of all people. then ordinary citizens is in trouble. I come dey ask, what is the way forward in this country. Because our lives are no longer  protected.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Who no whether they offer he money as a bribe that made the DPO to reject the bribe to stand as a good police man that caused his death we don't no, or whether he collected the bribe and later exposed the bad guys that lead to his death we don't no. If truly they want to know the outcome of the death of the DPO, I don't think it will take the IG of police a week to bring those bad guys to book, if other police men are not involve in this matter because, police men no how to fight themselves for position and money. Well, we all no that the country is not too save for ordinary citizens, that is why we need to mine our business as a crypto users so that we will not use our mouths talk what will back fire us later.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: @SmartgoatTo make your post authentic and more valid, include a link to a news about it next time. How gunmen killed Rivers DPO – PoliceThe reason the DPO was attacked was not known. Nigeria has been brutal like this since many years ago. Pastor has been killed this way before. Boko Haram have slaughtered someone in front of camera while made live for public to see. Even in a relationship, a husband or boyfriend has poured acid on his wife or his girlfriend before. If you read news often, you will often read more of bad occurrences like this.

comments.body: You do well to bring this update come here, back to wating you been dey talk, some people kill DPO, for me maybe the dpo self done do something wrong to those people and you know say nowadays this country done corrupt well well, maybe this DPO nah one of those Policemen way they collect bribe for high ways or for illegal business. Even if this our country done dey corrupt, person no go just dey on him own and some group of men or boys go just come behead am.Yes e good make we as Nigeria just dey mind our business and make we all dey safe and stay out of trouble so that we go fit stay safer.Anyway our police officers them dey really really try and still them dey too corrupt but e still get the once way still dey understand, but the funny thing be say those other police men way dey good, some citizens they call them bad people because way them set do their illegal business those good policemen no dey collect bribes.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Killing for Nigeria no dey be anything again and one thing wey you go know be say security people na target for this our insecurity challenge. Gun men dey attack police people wella, maybe dem dey vex for some attrocities wey over do police men dey do and that fit cause make mob action happen on top anyone wey lose guide himself. The police people too dey over show people even innocent people no be small. I no justify mob action but I just dey try say na some reasons wey fit cause something like that. To secure police people, na the reason dem build quarters and police barracks for them but things don fall apart. The barracks are not even maintained that is if they still exist in the nature that it was built or they are now even subletting them.

Na waoh o see as person we dey serve him country take die go. Sometimes e fit be say the police people don over do pass themselves because we know how police dey oppress people for we country.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: Quote from: Smartgoat on September 10, 2023, 01:51:33 PMI think everyone should be very careful now. the country has gone out of control, from head to bottom.    A whole Divisional police officer, butchered like a Rabbit in one LGA in a state in Nigeria and they jubilantly beheaded him, cut off his hand, legs and dismembered his body including his penix . since this news broke, I never get myself and I feel terribly pained.the young lads that killed him were boasting and celebrating, what a shame to this country. if this can of a thing will happen to D.P.O of all people. then ordinary citizens is in trouble. I come dey ask, what is the way forward in this country. Because our lives are no longer  protected.It is very sad on how our security system have become so porous to this extent. I really think the brutal killing of this man was grand conspiracy. It's very bad that those that stand out to take the risk of saving lives and property of our dear country have been led to cruel brutality of this nature over the years. Remember this man single handedly brought the crisis in Ogoni to a hault.I think the government have jeopardize and compromised the security of this country by not equipping our security personnel with adequate weapons.Imagine a situation whereby a criminal or a terrorist is holding a sophisticated weapon and a security personnel is holding a weaker one. It isn't gonna work at all because irrespective of the fact that they are securing lives and property they are human as well, blood runs in their vain as well and they have families and friends to also take care of just like normal bloody civilians.Now again let us also think of how these bad boys and terrorists get their sophisticated weapon. It is still the same security operative that are being compromised. Tell me how these bad gangs get guns and bullets if not with the help of these so called security operative.It is just unfortunate to how the security of individuals and properties are given less attention. The incessant occurrence of such cases of this nature can put fear among the citizens and even on security personnel. No one will be eager to join the forces again.If our security system will keep on being jeopardize and compromised like this I just think the best option is to legalize arms to all citizens. Let every individual take care of their safety period.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: I don't how to explain this, how the lives of our police officers are no longer safe as em d d before(police officers are all living in fears). Wey be sae ordinarily citizens no d talk good or take eye see police officers as people who are meant to safeguard them from crimes. Like play like play our police officers do become the main target of the hit of the bad ones. Is no longer the bad ones being afraid of seeing police officers, nowadays na police officers d fear to live their lives or make it known openly sae dem be police officers safeguarding the lives of people. I don't know how we get to this stage of ordinal citizens having bad intention toward our military personnel, but what I know is that, things can be done to curtail it. Let the police officers go back to their drawing board to know where they are getting it wrong, that made Nigerian citizens to have so much hatred on them. That made them to be happy when a police officer is been killed. Wey be sae citizenry and police officers suppose get cordial relationship between them two.

comments.body: Well, the things we are hearing, and the things we are seeing now in this country is going behold human imagination insecurity, in the country is getting beyond human imagination, killing everyday,kidnapping, arm robbing everyday, the way forward is to look unto GOD in prayer the author an finisher of our faith,because of hardship ritual killing is the talk of the town where our young once in the country now go into ritual activities because of money an luxurious life, secure u'r self an pray hard.

You claimed that your lips could not adequately describe the entire situation, but I believe that I have seen brief recordings of the assault and the simultaneous recording of it, and I was troubled by the lads' apparent lack of regard for human life. It even went to the point of killing a DPO, but nothing was done. Currently, my state government has established a task team to address possible problems like this, and other governments should do the same if not it will be more difficult to control.

comments.body: Nice topic. Like I will always say death is never an option no matter what. But concerning this matter nobody knew what happened and what caused the death of the police man but taking the life of someone is very bad. For example police in my area are very annoying, harassing people, taking money from keke drivers unnecessary, some even go ahead to hit the keke light with their gun or stick and I have witnessed this in several occasions and this police officers knowing fully well that some of this keke drivers are cultist and they keep doing the same thing taking money from them. Some thing like this happened in my community, a police officer was shut to death by bad boies but death is never an option

Na so outsiders dey talk down on Nigeria too because of few bad eggs, make we no do the same to ourselves.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: I think we've come, or should I say that, I've come to the point where nothing surprises me anymore in this country, it is commonly said in igbo proverb that.."mgbe ahapụ ihe ọjọọ ka ọ nọrọ ogologo oge n'obodo anyị, ọ atụgharị bia buru omenala. - it simply means - When bad things are allowed to dwell in our community for a long time, it turns and becomes tradition.All this things happening is a testament to how failed, the country is, how failed, our security system is, and to be honest, I do not pity what ever security agent or personel that falls victim like this D.P.O, for what a man sow, that he shall reap, policemen contributed immensely to the failed state, the Nigeria security system is today, how can they think that ordinarily citizens in the country will continue to die unjustly, and it will never get to them? What goes around, surely comes around - so they say.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Quote from: Smartgoat on September 10, 2023, 01:51:33 PMI think everyone should be very careful now. the country has gone out of control, from head to bottom.    A whole Divisional police officer, butchered like a Rabbit in one LGA in a state in Nigeria and they jubilantly beheaded him, cut off his hand, legs and dismembered his body including his penix . since this news broke, I never get myself and I feel terribly pained.the young lads that killed him were boasting and celebrating, what a shame to this country. if this can of a thing will happen to D.P.O of all people. then ordinary citizens is in trouble. I come dey ask, what is the way forward in this country. Because our lives are no longer  protected. This incidence happened in a place called Ahoada in Rivers State and honestly when I heard the news, some part of me was like "there wouldn't have been this much lawlessness if those at the helm of affairs where doing their duties right".Now, I'm not in support of such barbaric act but I feel the disregard for the police department began the moment they started extorting money from commercial drivers on the roads. The issue of insecurity is a big problem and to be frank, I began to feel for the civilians over there. Is this another issue we need to call the govt out on? I doubt. The worst part is even if these boys are caught, more will be inspired by their "act of bravery" and would want to perpetuate more evil.
